name: Bell Jar Bindle Charity Drive
description:
It's time to deliver the Bell Jam Bindle! Up to four players can take charge of the delivery vehicle, with the aim being to reach your end destination as quickly as possible without losing your bindle-based payload, with bonus money raised for a speedy delivery and for the minerals mined and collected along the way.

The number of players is automatically assigned based on how many controllers  are connected upon starting. If none are connected, keyboard is used for one player instead. The controls are:

Move - A/D or Left Stick.

Jump - W or Bottom Button (aka A on Xbox).

Toggle control (while in front of it) - S or Right Button (aka B on Xbox).
